skillTree.name: Ancestral Grudge
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven

skillTree.name: Resolute
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Gyrocopter
skillTree.description: Gyrocopters are revolutionary flying machines that provides the armies of the Dwarfs with dedicated aerial support or as a form of fast reconnaissance.

effects.description: Mount: Gyrocopter (not visible on campaign map)

skillTree.name: Break Open the Casks!
skillTree.description: Dwarfen craftsmanship ensures any weapon is infinitely more likely to run out of ammunition before succumbing to the stress of battle!

skillTree.name: Requisition
skillTree.description: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +12% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +20% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Triangulation
skillTree.description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +7% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Overseer
skillTree.description: Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.

skillTree.name: Sapper
skillTree.description: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Zhufbar 42-Pounders
skillTree.description: "Bring the Barag forwards! Hand me that spyglass!"

skillTree.name: Dead Eye
skillTree.description: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.

skillTree.name: Hand-Loaded
skillTree.description: Each round delicately crafted to deliver death with a personal touch.

skillTree.name: Bare Essentials
skillTree.description: While many engineers carry innumerable tools on their person, some espouse the art of carrying only five different protractors.

skillTree.name: Barak Varr Handshake
skillTree.description: By which one greets grobi and urk alike.

skillTree.name: Grudge-Raker
skillTree.description: With this double-barreled, pellet-spewing device, one can riddle a single target or blast a swathe into oncoming troops.

effects.description: "Grudge Raker" ammunition (decreased range and increased number of projectiles)

skillTree.name: Carry a Big Stick
skillTree.description: The deadly blast of the Grudge-raker inspires fear in even the most dimwitted creature.

skillTree.name: Percussive Maintenance
skillTree.description: In possession of countless irreplaceable tools and devices, no Master Engineer goes down without a fight!

skillTree.name: Technical Enhancements
skillTree.description: Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.

skillTree.name: Cinderblast Shell
skillTree.description: "Stand Back! These are Dawr, but this is only the milluzth attempt!"

ui_effects.description: ➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 500 250 damage and 100 25 explosion damage (8m)

skillTree.name: Bolt Thrower Mastery
skillTree.description: Alright, ya want me to hit 'em in the eyes... which eye?

effects.description:
Bolt Thrower: +3% reload time reduction, ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Bolt Thrower: +6% reload time reduction, ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Bolt Thrower: +10% reload time reduction, ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Cannon Mastery
skillTree.description: Aye, I've assembled hundreds in the fires of Zhufbar.

effects.description:
Cannon: +3% range, ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Cannon: +6% range, ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Cannon: +10% range, ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Flame Cannon Mastery
skillTree.description: The most precisely calculated pressure valves allow the crews to fire faster and more efficiently.

effects.description:
Flame Cannon: +4% reload time reduction and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

Flame Cannon: +8% reload time reduction and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

Flame Cannon: +12% reload time reduction and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Grudge Thrower Mastery
skillTree.description: Having carved the most heinous of grudges into the stones, the crew, seething with anger, redoubles their efforts.

effects.description:
Grudge Thrower: +4% range and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

Grudge Thrower: +8% range and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

Grudge Thrower: +12% range and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Organ Gun Mastery
skillTree.description: Clean and maintain those barrels, Dawi, and this weapon will slaughter countless Urks.

effects.description:
Organ Gun: +4% ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Organ Gun: +8% ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Organ Gun: +12% ammunition and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Adamant Plating
skillTree.description: A rare form of Gromril that only the most skilled artisans and engineers can manipulate, providing incredible protection.

effects.description:
Gyrobomber: +4% ward save and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

Gyrobomber: +8% ward save and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

Gyrobomber: +12% ward save and ammunition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Reinforced Rotors
skillTree.description: Only the most mad--or inebriated--Dwarf Engineer would ever consider weaponizing the rotor. Although those blades do spin very fast...

effects.description:
Gyrocopter: +3% melee and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Gyrocopter: +7% melee and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

Gyrocopter: +15% melee and missile damage
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Organized
skillTree.description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -15% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Vendor Contacts
skillTree.description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.

skillTree.name: Architect
skillTree.description: My lord, we can save time and supplies if we make some slight modifications to this design.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -6% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Emergency Stockpiles
skillTree.description: For use only in the most dire of circumstances.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +3% when defending
	(own armies in region)

Ammunition: +6% when defending
	(own armies in region)

Ammunition: +10% when defending
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Apprentice Marksman
skillTree.description: You will fetch ammunition, clean and repair weapons, and do anything else our marksmen require of you

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% when defending
	(own armies in region)

Reload time reduction: +6% when defending
	(own armies in region)

Reload time reduction: +10% when defending
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Laboratory
skillTree.description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Grimnir
backgroundSkills.description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Grungni
backgroundSkills.description: This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Valaya
backgroundSkills.description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Thaggoraki Slayer
backgroundSkills.description: Skaven will die for our brothers lost in the deep tunnels!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Skaven
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Gazul
backgroundSkills.description: Even in the time of the Ancestor Gods, Gazul pondered long on the mortality of his race.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Morgrim
backgroundSkills.description: Morgrim was the first Dwarf Engineer. He developed and taught his clans the techniques of crafting engines of war and other devices.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +15% for all missile units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Smednir
backgroundSkills.description: Smednir is a Dwarf deity of some importance, because of his patronage of metalworking and the refining of ore.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Thungni
backgroundSkills.description: The younger son of Grungni and Valaya, Thungni is the god of Runic magic and runesmithing.

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +25%
	(own characters in region)

Upkeep: -5% for Lords and Heroes
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Grobi Slayer
backgroundSkills.description: Greenskins don't deserve to live longer than a fly.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)
